profile_summary:
Core Engine/C++ Optimization Engineer with 13+ years of experience in high-performance application development, specialized in optimizing performance and efficiency. Proficient in **C++**, with strong expertise in **multithreading**, **CPU optimization**, and **profiling** techniques. Demonstrated ability to utilize **VTune** and **console profiling tools** for in-depth analysis and optimization of applications across console platforms.

While my primary focus aligns with performance enhancement, I also bring a wealth of experience from the healthcare and financial industries, with skills encompassing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Adept in both frontend and backend technologies, including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.

Skilled in modern software development practices, I have experience building AI/ML-powered platforms and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. My background includes implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines, as well as ensuring compliance with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
